text: Just wanted to let you guys know this seems to have been fixed. Thanks HubSpot!
Help please, why do I see 5 facebook pixel codes in the same domain? We have 5 different domains but each pixel should be in the corresponding domain, not all in one. :smiling_face_with_tear:

I would look in settings, website settings then in your footer/head html and look for the facebook codes. I would expect theyre all in there. You would want to use the domain picker to set those in the head/footer for the corresponding domains instead of across all domains.
